link_desc:
Check out the link for more information

Recently we here at Opensource ICT Solutions have built a new integration for your Zabbix setup. A lot of Zabbix users have hosts that they want to display on the map. For example if you have Zabbix hosts that change location every few days or just to create an overview of your current Zabbix hosts.

With our new integration we made this easy for you. We use Google Maps to display the Zabbix hosts right into your Zabbix frontend as you can check out the added image.

There's a lot more to discover with this integration, so check out the link for more information.
author: Opensource ICT Solutions
